comment: First of all, she is gorgeous and brings donuts to class!! She clearly cares about her students and will always go the extra mile. Her assignments are fair and clearly described. Loved the class!
GREAT teacher. So sad she's leaving after Spring 2013. Cares about students and wants them to become great writers. She can be strict with grading and participation, but it's for your own good.

She's intimidating. But putting that aside, she's an great teacher. She knows what she's teaching. She's a hard grade but its because she wants you to be a great writer. Also, take any chance to have a one-on-one with her to look over your paper. She is.

Amazing professor. Very clear on what she wants with your essays. She really uses the textbook, so make sure you do your reading. She brings in donuts and coffee because she is amazing. She is a hilarious woman, and I enjoyed her class. Make sure you attend, though. Overall, great professor. Would definitely take her class again.

As far as English professors go, she isn't bad. She is a bit unclear of what she wants until AFTER you do your first draft. That being said, she is incredibly funny (which I appreciate). Attendance is crucial (sigh), so go to class. She also holds you until the end every single time, and sometimes a little over. But, overall, she is a quality prof.

Crystal is really great. I would absolutely recommend taking her class. She is very knowledgeable in all things business related. She makes it really clear on what she expects. She genuinely wants her students to do well.
SHE ALWAYS KEEPS CLASS LATE. KEEP THIS IN MIND! If you have class right after hers you will probably be late. And I always contemplate dropping out of school in this class because she crushes dreams.

TAKE HER WHILE YOU CAN!! Crystal is intimidating but that's because she good at what she does. I've learned more English from her than I did all 4 years of high school. She has a background in business, & she's takes a different approach to writing. She's tough but, if you work for it, an A is achievable. This is her first & last year teaching.
She is very clear and concise. She is also very funny! Love her! And she brings us donuts and coffee on speaker days!

She gives you everything upfront but then when you write your rough draft and bring it to class she tells you it's all wrong. but she's helpful. go to the writing center and read. if you don't she'll make you diagram sentences.
